Then when plugged into a laptop, I can't get the right channel to give me any real volume, only left. It's very annoying and ruins what is otherwise not a bad sounding headset.

author: Austin
title: Don't pass up this deal!
content:
The overwhelming amount of positive reviews on these headphones was what ultimately sold me on them, and I must say I agree with what others have said. As far as sound quality goes, these are competitive with other headphones way above their price range. They aren't going to out-perform $300 Sennheisers or anything, but they are easily on par with something you would find for $50. If that's what you are looking for, give these a shot first - you might just save yourself $40.

A few notes...
- The sound quality is surprisingly good for their price point, and I was shocked by the amount of bass they are actually able to output. It's not head-rattling, but they definitely have more capacity than I expected.
- They're not the most comfortable headphones I've ever tried (that award goes to the Phillips SHP9500s and would be hard to beat), but they're not the most uncomfortable pair either. As far as on-ear headphones go, these are pretty good in this area - I can wear them for several hours before they start to bother me. There are certainly worse options out there.
- I have not tried using the mic, so I can't comment on that one way or the other.
- I really like the metal strain relief they used on the plug. I have never seen any other headphones with that feature and it works well, so this helps elevate these above the rest.
- These don't have much in the way of noise cancellation, but they weren't advertised as such and I didn't expect them to, so no real problem there - just more of an FYI for anyone who might be curious. They do block a little bit of outside noise, but don't expect complete silence. Basically, if someone 5 feet away from me is talking at a normal conversational level, with music playing I can still tell that they are talking but I can't hear them well enough to tell what they are saying (I've received more than several irritated responses from my wife when asking her "what did you say?").

These have become my go-to headphones for general everyday listening. I'll reach for one of my more expensive sets if I really want to relax and sink into some good tunes, but these are more than adequate for just about everything else. I have a pair of the (discontinued) Amazon Basics headphones that I use every day at work, and honestly I think these sound better. If those ever break, I will absolutely be buying another set of these to replace them.

author: Marlon F.
title: Good sound for price
content: If you looking for budget headphones then these are pretty good. They are on the ear and are actually comfortable than other on hear headphones. They are wired, which I like cause it gives me that old school feeling and the sound is descent. Bass is not terrible, nor are the highs and mids. So for pretty happy with them for budget headphones.

author: Sherry Shimko
title: Great headphones, they are very easy to store!
content: The sound quality is great. However, I am not very picky. I have had them for almost a month and they still work great. Overall, I am very satisfied with the quality and price.

author: alexander p xalxo
title: Really good quality to be honest.
content: I love this product. The product itself is very good. I love the noise cancellation because it really will help me in the future. The price is really good for the product. However I do rate it a 4, I would 4 1/2 is because I’m not sure how the microphone works. It seems like it’s easy enough to figure out, but maybe a little instruction on that would be nice. That’s all.

author: Marvel
title: Cool headphones
content: I bought this headphones for my sister for her listening, and she is satisfied with it. For its price, can’t complain. Good sound quality, sturdy enough, protection of wire at Its end against wire folding

author: Amazon Customer
title: All the features needed at an affordable price.
content: For such a small package the sound is great and the comfort is perfect. Late night music, movies and tv are once more enjoyable without disturbing the rest of the household. These may not be the ultimate headphones but they sure are a great value.

author: Casey
title: Great For Price
content: I got these for my son to use at school as he is not fond of earbuds.  They arrived Saturday so I gave them a run myself.  I only had my laptop vol to 20 and I could not hear my son yelling with his friends online 7ft away from me.  The music fade from left to right ear was very good.  I was really surprised by it, especially for $15.  I also like the metal plug.  It seems durable.  That is a problem with my boys and earbuds.  And, they are comfy for me as well as my son.

author: Keith Frantesl
title: Good product for the price
content:
Are you looking for wired headphones? No need to look further .. just buy these.
Only criticism is my large ears don't allow for padded headphones to completely cover them.. but i have that issue with every headphone, so normal human beings should be fine. They are comfortable as the description states, and sound quality is about what you would expect.

author: Syrinx09
title: Fine for my purposes
content: They're ok. I'm not an audiophile or I would not be happy. Just using to watch YouTube vids without disturbing others. Finish looks better in the pictures than in person. Durability yet to be determined.

author: jyoung1z
title: My child uses these but I have not heard any complaints at all about them.
content: My child likes these. He said, " his teacher at school had these and is the reason I bought these for my child". I again have not heard any reports of these don't work, I can't hear anything, I can only hear out of 1 side. No reports like that yet. So far so Good.

author: Steve S. Eckerd
title: Great sound
content: Wanted to replace earbuds for longer term listening.  This set of headphones are far more comfortable than in ear buds for watching movies during travel.  The sound is amazing compared to using ear buds, and blocks out most outside noise. I considered blue tooth and noise cancellation sets, but preferred not to have batteries to replace or charge. Like the mic button for pausing video if interrupted.  Very good price for great headphones.

author: museken
title: These are the greatest head phones for the price and very durable
content: I 'm  an audiophile. I have sony MDRS Sennheisers, Porta pro HD., and Grados.  The music I love goes from Iron Maiden to Lionel Richie, to Pennywise,  to Alabama I love sound... These head phones are out of the box.. They sound great. I  did not know when I purchase them they had a volume adjustment . It's so sleek you can hardly notice it but it works. I don't tell people to buy something . Boy oh boy for the price... Everyone in the world should have a set of these. They are built and sound magnificent  for your laptop or phone. If you had to go to something else I would say portapros but they break to easy.  I don't know how anyone can sell these for this price.... Buy them and then I dare you to tell me I  lied.

author: Emowen
title: The best I've had
content: I've bought several of these for myself, my child and others.  They are the best I've found so far.  They have lasted my 11 year old nearly 2 years and he is rough on headphones.  They have decent bass, they are not loose on your head, they sound fantastic! Will buy again.

author: Anne D
title: great product for the low price
content:
I've been using them for about 2 weeks now for phone calls, listening to music and online work that requires a headset. I love how they are flexible and you can turn the ear pads out and adjust them to your ear or lift one forward and the other one on your ear if you need to. Sound so far has been great, at the very beginning there was some feedback issue with the built in microphone when I used it on my computer but since then it's been working just fine. There isn't a volume control on the headset itself, but I don't mind that and have found that other products that have this can be finicky and not work as well or cause problems. One change I'd make to improve it would be to make this product but with a flat cord so it would be even more portable and easy to store/carry around. Other than that, it's been awesome.
Great product for the price line. I'd definitely recommend it.

author: Zechariah W.
title: Not too shabby
content: Decent headphones for the price. The earpads don't cover the entire ear but they are soft and comfortable. I wear eyeglasses at work which can create a pinch behind my ear depending on the headphone. I can wear them all day with minimal issues. Sound is good, bass is deep and there's even some noise cancelling. The mic works well and I like the spring they put on the 3.5mm connector. The fold up design is compact which is nice. Only complaint is some static noise when there's no audio coming through. This is a non issue when something is playing, however.

author: ginny
title: A great price for a superb product.
content: I use this head phone exclusively for my cd's.  I am 85 years old and have worn out quite a few head phones in my time.  This one is the best.  It has a rich base sound which is clear and seems to effectively cancel out all other sounds. Further, I believe the price is more than reasonable given the qualities it provides.

author: Yossef Ehrlichman
title: Great headphones for Death metal
content: Wow. I was skeptic when I read previous reviews and looked at the price. But the headphones are great! Listened to some Slayer and Pathology. The music is very lovely to the ears

author: Pianistapr
title: Excellent quality, small form factor, solid sound.
content:
Pros:

Very compact and easy to store and carry around.  The speakers have an ample range of movement.
The sound is crisp and has a pretty good bass.
They are very comfortable even for a person that wears eye glasses but after several hours it starts to hurt (glasses) which is no fault of the headset.  I usually have to take a break with other headsets (even more expensive ones) after 1 hour.
It is compatible with the XBox One adapter and controllers with the 3.5mm jack as well as the PS4.  The sound when playing is perfect and it is a very good alternative to expensive brands.
The connector has a metallic shell that protects the wire from pulls and bends which is a definitive plus.
The padding is good but does not go over your ear unless you have tiny ears.

Cons:

The microphone is in the wire and it normally doesn't fall in the direction of your mouth, sometimes people might not hear you loudly but so far, it has worked without issues when I play.

author: Luis Diaz
title: Great portability
content: I recently bought a set of headphones and I am very happy with the quality of the product. I especially like the way they are flat and can get into my backpack without damaging the headphones themselves. Sound quality is good and microphone to answer phone calls works really well.

author: theodore
title: Cord too long
content:
They are good because the function well on top of folding making ideal for storing in my backpack. I have 2 cons.
1. The cord is too long. Personally I would have it be 8inches shorter. Listening to music with my phone in my pocket, the cord would catch on things very easy. Kinda annoying having to babysit the cord.
2. After 30mins the headphone make my ears feel sore. Not sure if this could be fixed in headphones. Personally wouldn’t buy again. I’d just get the Sony headphones. I wanted to try this brand because it was cheaper but my experience with wasn’t to great.

author: Alex
title: I had a positive review INITIALLY
content: It was good at first but now everytime i use it i have to hold the button in for the stupid thing to work. Dont buy this piece of junk.

author: Krista R
title: Solid quality for the price
content: I ordered these for our kids to use for some school programs, but they are quite well made for the price. The cord has a fray protection on the jack portion, which is extremely nice for kid use, the sound quality was better than many more expensive that I've tried, and I felt as if the balance of sound for music was surprisingly good. The rotating ear muffs make putting them in a drawer easy, and the adjustable head band is perfect for a variety of ages. The noise cancelation for this type of headset was about average - some noise leaks out at higher level, and I could definitely still hear my four year old on the floor next to me - but perhaps my four year old is just extra noisy. ;-) In addition, I wasn't looking for a superb job of noise cancelation, so I wasn't too concerned about that. Overall, I have to say, I was quite impressed and would definitely purchase them again, whether for music or audio books.

author: DavyMac
title: Awesome! Works with PS4!
content:
I use this to play games on my PS4. I connect the plug into the controller, then adjust the volume of the headset and mic in the PS4 settings tab. The sound quality is great! We have an LG TV - with the earphones, I'm hearing subtleties in the sound effects and music that I've never heard before. The bass is great. For the price, this is a steal!

I haven't owned this for very long yet, so I have no comments about it's longevity. I'll post an update if anything bad happens.

author: Bubba Cash
title: As good as my expensive head sets!
content: Every time I plug these headphones into my iPhone I marvel at the sound-especially the base. And this for such an inexpensive head set. Love the jazzy red color. They are plastic so I am sure to handle with care.

author: HbBr
title: good quality and price
content: I gave this as a gift and so far they had positive experience with it.  sound is clear with microphones. One thing that bothers is the part that covers the ear are not fixed but are hinged with a C frame.

author: Norma-Jeane
title: Great quality at a good price
content: Ordered these to use for podcasting and they’ve been outstanding! Fit is very comfortable and noise cancelling. I like how the audio part can be folded in when not in use. Think it also gives range because everyone’s heads are different lol.  Thank you!

author: AustenD.
title: Great sound quality
content: I was really pleasantly surprised with this product. The sound quality really is fabulous. The construction of the parts feels sturdy. The cord length is great. My only suggestion for improvement is that the ear pieces be a little bigger. The material is comfortable on my ear, but the ear piece is just a little small for my big ears, so I have to situate them just right over my ears to be comfortable. But for the price, the quality of sound (which is super important!) is really, really good! Very pleased with this purchase.

author: Nicholas
title: Great product, especially for the price
content: I just received these headphones and they’re better than I expected, given the price. They’re comfortable (I have a large head and they fit well, plus the headband is padded), and the sound quality is high. I use them to listen to programs on my iPad and computer mostly, and to listen to music occasionally.  I like the way they fold up neatly.  And the cord doesn’t tangle.  I also wish that Apple would take note of the way the cord at the plug end is fashioned so that it won’t fray - they could learn a thing or two.  The mic seems to work well too.

author: suep
title: Excitedly Surprised!
content:
I was pleased with the rapid shipping, excellent packaging and above all the product!  I did not realize that my old earphones were such a low quality-I slid these on and picked up a movie I had paused and the sound was great!  I can adjust the fit to be very comfortable.  There is a wire coil around the connection to increase the life of the product.
I will be very happy to order another set of earphones for my husband without hesitation.

author: GNunn
title: Size does matter
content: The headphone were a gift for someone who has had difficulty find a "good" pair of earphones with a microphone that weren't the earbud style -- this pair was an excellent choice with all the right features

author: KelliBos
title: Comfort and Noise Cancellation is great!
content: Very comfortable, bass is good, noise cancellation is great. I wish the volume was a bit louder or a control on the headset itself. They are a keeper; but I will still search for a second pair.  Other than volume, I would have rated 5 stars!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Durable
content: I bought this set for my professional office because my old one broke. Since many of my clients are kids I wanted something durable but not expensive. I've been using these for over a week and have been pleased.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good for Price!
content: These headphones came packaged in a tiny box and I thought it would only fit a child, bit was surprised how well they fit my head (a girl) but as well as my BF (big headed). I have a toddler and they don't so much as noise cancellation, but he is also very loud. They adjust well to the volume I put on the computer and the quality is very good. My BF games and he hasn't had any complaints about them. I think they're a great buy for the money. Can't beat.

author: E. Alden
title: The most uncomfortable headphones I have ever used.
content: These headphones are heavy and loose-fitting at the ears no matter how they are adjusted.  They offer no kind of seal, and put a lot of pressure on the top of the head.

author: Kindle Customer
title: GREAT PRODUCT!
content:
You would not believe the number of headphones I've been through BEFORE I found these.
These are more comfortable than others I've had, better priced, and the sound quality is awesome.
Ordering was simple, delivery was quick, and I have no complaints.

author: Mike Burke
title: Amazing Sound - Amazing Headphones!
content:
In the past three months I've gone through five headphones. Two broke as they were cheaply made, two had poor sound, and the fifth are expensive Bluetooth headphones which have decent sound but I use them strictly for TV viewing.

These headphones were cheaply priced at $14.99 and had great reviews so I thought I would try them out. As it turns out these are the best sounding headphones I have ever used! I don't say that lightly. I am very picky when it comes to sound. The tones are rich and the bass is amazing. I have to keep the volume low because of the amount of power they produce. Rock music sounds incredible with these!  I can actually feel the bass which hasn't happened with any of the headphones I've used. They also do a great job with filtering outside noise. Currently I live near very noisy neighbors and usually with headphones on I can still hear them which drives me nuts. I like to listen to music to escape and just clear mind so noisy neighbor ruin that. These headphones totally blocks them out. You can truly get lost in your music or videos without outside distractions.

There is only one negative but it's minor for me. They are a little loose compared to other headphones I've used but they stay on my head so it's fine.  It's possible if I was to move around a lot with on they could slide back. They are comfortable so it doesn't bother me and sometimes tighter headphones could cause a headache anyway. So really not a big deal unless you have a tiny head.

Overall I love these headphones and all the positive reviews are right. I am stunned that such a good pair of headphones are this affordable.  I may get another pair just in case I accidentally break these!

author: Daniel Alvarez
title: This may be one of the best I've had but I can't describe one thing...
content:
I looked for good headphones and found these. Not too bad for the price and how they looked.
Here's the pros and cons, in my opinion:
Pros:
- Good Sound Quality
-  Able to hear/make calls on phone.
Cons:
- Didn't had a case (Minor)
- Doesn't have an portable aux like wire to pull in/out and carry. (Minor)

I couldn't describe about the noise cancellation because I'm divided on where its at. But I can give an explaination: if you're in a place that's loud, turn up the volume, or if it is quiet, make it sound at a right spot, but have some care with the eardrums as well.

Bottom line: I'm digging these headphones, they are the best with what you only expect but I myself love them. High recommend.

author: Ryan
title: Amazing quality for the price
content:
I was initially really skeptical of this headset given the price, but the reviews convinced me to give it a try anyways. It was a great decision to try it! The sound quality is good, I love how long the cable is so there's never any awkward moments when the cord goes taut, and the headset is generally pretty comfortable.

My only complaint is that personally the actual ear cushions are a bit small for me, so they press on the tips of my ears in a way that makes them a bit sore. It's a very minor setback, though. Still highly recommend the product!

author: Keriann
title: Perfect classroom headphones
content: Great product for easy storage in my classroom. My students all say they are comfortable to wear and good sound quality. I would not consider this a noise cancelling headphone, but a well made product nonetheless. The durable cord is perfect for regular wear and tear of many students using them throughout the day.

author: Angelene Hemphill
title: They fit perfectly
content:
Considering the size of the box, l thought l received a different product. I opened the box and said wow these are perfect. I carry medium to large size purses, so these are easy to travel with. The item wasn't to big, it too small. It came well packaged, and easy to work with. The sound and volume is just right for me. Will recommend.

Thanks

author: Sarah
title: Foldable headphones with great sound.
content:
Lightweight headphones with incredible volume. I don’t necessarily love that they are foldable, but others will.

I wouldn’t buy these just to cancel out surrounding noise, but as headphones to actually listen to things, they work great.

author: VB
title: Very Pleased With These Headphones!!
content: These headphones have a great design and are quite aesthetically pleasing. I was also super impressed with the sound quality these have with their price point. I am able to listen to music for long hours without any issues of discomfort. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a pair of headphones.

author: Emptyquarter
title: Nice job to the maker
content:
In the past 10 years, I have had about 8 pairs of earphones. I was looking for a non-charged,
wired, light, small, high quality ones. Failure after failure....until today, I found the one fits all my need.
Easy to carry, takes only little space, no worry about running out battery, cable is non-tangle....
This is the earphone.

author: Gene J
title: Simplicity itself
content:
We bought these because my wife can't seem to get the hang of Bluetooth.  It uses a simple jack just like back in the 60s.
They are lite, comfortable and fit well.  Now she can listen to her music in peace.

For the record it has no volume control but the control on the IPhone is all she needs.

author: BillyAtx7
title: Great budget headphones!
content: I don't believe these are supposed to be "noise canceling" but they do help to reduce outside noise well. I bought these for work to use during our video conference meetings. They are perfect for this and the mic is very good. Everyone in the meeting can hear me well and the audio that comes through is solid. Also tried listening to music with these and it has a good sound. No complaints. And the reinforced connector end is a nice touch. They also fold up well when you need them out of the way. My one small critique is maybe they are a little too tight, but maybe I can stretch them a bit to help them loosen over time. Other than that, great headphones!

author: Syd huston
title: Very decent headphones, with some apparent flaws
content:
The earmuffs feel like they are always pressing against my ears, and is starting to make them ache after wearing them for only a few minutes, the arch on the top is irritating my head and overall uncomfortable, doesn't help that I need to wear glasses making them just that more uncomfortable.
the sound is decent but the bass sounds very weak and that doesn't help when my work is centered around music most of the time.
Overall if you are in a desperate situation for headphones these are decent, but if you are not I do not recommend these to anybody. 3/10

author: Robin G.
title: Noise Cancellation
content: There are a lot of birds around my apartment building this time of year and they are especially noisy. The constant chirping of baby birds becomes annoying after a while since it's basically all day -- I'm retired so I'm home a lot.  As soon as I put the headphones on, that noise stops. I actually put them on just to stop hearing it. It's great.  The sound quality is crystal clear to me when I'm listening to music. Overall I'm quite happy with this purchase. Also, they are comfortable to wear.

author: stacey
title: Great headphones at a great price!
content: Great headphones, very sturdy and my kid loves the Comfort and the fit! This mama loves the fact that she doesn't have to listen to her kids tablet any longer... LOL. Great bargain on some good headphones, noise cancelling works just fine for a adolescent. On the issue as the volume control is a little hard for little kids to figure out on their own, my kid ends up pausing his stuff more than turning it down, but don't let that stop you from buying it you just need to show them how to do it don't expect them to know how to do it on their own.

author: In my opinion...
title: Nice!
content: Nice simple design.  Fits well and def cancel out outside noise.  The sound quality is amazing!  I've been using earbuds, and I HATE the new ones that are supposed to fit inside your ear...nope, they SUCK.  These have amazing sound, keep in mind it may depend on what your phones music listening controls have available.  But these are great!  I would def recommend them and get them as a gift for friends and family.

author: Diana Pereira
title: Great headphones for even better price
content: These headphones are great for watching videos on YouTube, to watching movies on Netflix and to listening to music. The sound quality is great, and the price of these headphones make it a bit of a steal. My only issues are the fact that the mic cannot be toggled on and off and they can get uncomfortable when worn for extended periods of time. But these are small problems compared to how great these headphones are. Would highly recommend.

author: BDillon
title: Can’t beat these!
content: It came time to replace my $40 headphones and this time around I needed something with a price that fit. I did a lot of looking and kept coming back to these. Glad I purchased them! They sound as good as my more pricey ones! I feel they cancel out background noice very well. They are comfy and can fold to keep inside the box if needed. I really like the little wire on the aux cord, smart feature to keep the cord from wearing out from bending. This pair of headphones can’t be beat, for a very affordable price!

author: Connor Duffy
title: Quality product
content: I can’t believe how nice these headphones are, especially for the low price. The sound quality is honestly great and the product itself is so durable with the metal jack and sturdy plastic. I highly recommend you purchase these headphones.  Also, the seller was easy to work with. They responded to my questions instantly and sent the item in a timely matter.

author: Jononarf
title: Perfect and Inexpensive Headphones for child-young adult use.
content:
My daughter needed new headphones after her little brother attacked her old pair with scissors. I was hesitant about the price, but saw that these mostly had 4-5 star ratings. So far, these have lived up to those user reviews on Amazon.

For the very generous price (and small packaging), this is a great set if you need something inexpensive but adequate for your basic listening needs. If you are not demanding a $50-100 quality headphones, this will get the job done as a backup. The fold-able design makes these really easy to store in something like a backpack or laptop carrying case. The metal case around the 3mm jack looks sturdy enough so that piece won't be torn as easy a year or two later like earbud pairs. The sound quality impressed me the most for some thing this cheap. As advertised, the bass is actually good. My daughter immediately tested them out while playing Minecraft, and she was able to hear her friends, the game, and was able to talk clearly to them through voice-chat.

One last thing: This set would be perfect if you are needing multiple pairs for computer stations at a school room or library.

author: Tina
title: Awesome headphones with great sound!!
content: I absolutely love these headphones!! First of all the sound quality is great! I love that they fold up also, my son has a dvd player in the car and these fold and fit nicely in the pocket on the seat. I for sure recommend these!!

author: ID-27529
title: Worked for me
content:
I needed these to listen to music and movies while in airports and they do the job.  I can't use noise cancelling ones as they give me terrible headaches.
These worked fine for me.  I was able to listen to what I wanted and couldn't really hear all the craziness of the airport.
The only reason for the -1 star is because with wearing glasses, it did put a little pressure on my head in that area and they would begin to hurt after a while.  I'd have to adjust about every 10 - 20 minutes to stop it from hurting.
However, all in all I'd recommend.

author: Tim Parker
title: Small and compact
content: Got these for my daughter who needed some headphones for school. They fit her alright and she has had no complaints while we were testing them out. The fact that they fold and are super compact helps them to not take up much space also

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nothing I don't like
content:
These seem like very well made headphones. The ear cups are soft, so they don't hurt my ears from pressing my ear into my glasses (like my Skullcandys used to do) and it fit my head very well, which I was concerned about from other reviews.

They're not noise-cancelling, which is huge for me. Noise-cancelling headphones make me anxious. I can hear my audio clear as a bell, but if something happened in the house or my fiance needed me and was calling me, I could hear him.

The cord and plug are very high quality materials, the cord won't tangle and the plug will last a long time, but isn't uncomfortable because there's a spring that supports the cord (I thought that might be more rigid, but it's not and I'm glad)

author: Brendan
title: Excellent pair of headphones for the price; runs a little small if you have a larger head
content:
Got these on a flash sale and couldn't be happier with the quality for the price. Been using a few weeks now. The sound quality is very good and the top band & ear phones have great cushion. I really like how adjustable they are in terms of rotating the cups both for storage and on-ear comfort. The cord also has a wire spring to keep from bending, which is nice and not something you always find in headphones at this pricepoint.

Only downside I can see for some people is that they do run small, both the band and cups themselves. Seems more suitable for children or smaller teens/adults. Luckily they work for me.

author: R. Bub
title: Works great. If you stay perfectly still...
content: Very dissatisfied. Better than average sound, to be sure... When the connection isn't crackling because I happen to be moving my phone around. I will definitely be returning these.

author: Leslie PJ
title: Good for music, not for movies or audiobooks
content: I don’t understand why this is the case, but I think the sound quality for these is good for listening to music, but when I use them for listening to audiobooks the speech is a bit fuzzy and there’s like this empty echo to the sound quality. Conversely, they seem perfectly good for listening to singing.  I’m not much of an audiophile and have no explanation for why this is the case, but would recommend these for music only, and not for listening to movies or books.

author: KB
title: These are impressive, even more so because of the price!
content: Wow!  I have to admit, I didn't have high hopes for this, but I wanted a pair of over the ear headphones.  I plugged these in as soon as I got them and I'm impressed!  I'm not an audiophile, but I do like crisp clear sound, and these deliver.  At 1/10th of the price of top of the line, these are definitely worth the $

author: emschwar
title: So far so good!
content: These arrived today, but so far, I’m really impressed! They seem like really good quality, especially given the price! They feel really solid, and the cushioning on the ear pieces is really comfy. Plus, they look nice too! Sound quality is great too.

author: Ahmer Ibrahim
title: Product performs well at a very attractive price point
content:
The unit is compact and relatively comfortable. Audio quality is good. Noise cancelling is not the greatest but better sets cost 4-5 times as much for a big name like BOSE or APPLE.

Item arrived on time in great condition. Packaging was good.

Off to a good start. hopefully this product will last a long time!

author: Leze
title: PRETTY COLOUR
content: BEAUTIFUL COLOUR, EDGY, MOVES AROUND, FOLDABLE. HOWEVER A LITTLE SMALL FOR MY EARS SO A BIT OF DISCOMFORT AFTER ON FOR A LONG TIME. CAN GIVE TO MY TEEN NIECE SOON .

author: Amazon Customer
title: Pretty good for price
content: They are a little big for my head. They are a little too tall for my head. And I have more of an oval head. I've seem to like one that are tighter on my ears which keeps the noise out. However, They fold really nice and wont take up much space.  And I absolutely love the color. I got the mint ones and in love with how they look. The outside of the ear parts look really cool as well. I'll be using these as back up headphones but good for the price they were

author: Joann C
title: Lasted 2 months
content: Inexpensive headphones were nice while they lasted, but sound on one side stopped working after only two months. Will not buy again.

author: Lizzy Boredom
title: Not Durable
content: The smallest size I could adjust the headband to was still a little too big for my regular sized adult head. But the worst part is that the input jack bit broke while it was plugged into my phone after one week of regular use. I'm hoping that part might be replaceable, but it would suck to have to throw these away for one little broken bit. These were not that cheap. It's not okay that they're basically trash right now.

author: Knud Samsing
title: GREAT HEADPHONES FOR THE PRICE
content:
I heard about your product from a friend who raved about the quality of sound, comfort and affordability of your headphones. I ordered them through Amazon and used them for the first time on a recent flight to China. The quality of the sound, comfort of the ear pads was even better than I'd expected. The fact that they are foldable is great, they fit easily into my briefcase. Last but certainly not least they are much, less expensive than products of comparable quality, I know because I shopped around and tested numerous ear phones. Frankly, based on my experience with your product, your price is too low.

Have a Great Day

author: Jessica Worle
title: Higher quality headphones for the price
content: This product is much more sturdy and impressive than I was expecting at this price range. Kind of regret only buying two pairs, I'll be buying more in the future for my other children, once their other brands of headphones wear out. They are missing some of the very deepest and sharpest of sounds, but can't be expected to contend with high-end headphones. You won't find better for this price. These have fairly good noise canceling, a guard to keep the jack (standard sized) from fraying at the cord, and higher than expected audio quality for the price. I will be buying these again. :)

author: R. Brandon Felts
title: Excellent value
content: There are one of the best sounding pair of headphones I've had and at an unbelievable price.  They are comfortable, have good bass and clear highs.  They seem durable although I have broke two pair through my own clumsiness.  Once I vacuumed the the plug up and that destroyed the cord and after that I rolled over the cord with a chair it broke at the control part of the value.  For the price you cant beat them

author: khashayar varzandeh
title: dependability
content: It only works for about 30 minutes before needing a full charge.  If you want to watch a show longer then 30 minues look for something else.  even after a 24 hour full charge the battery in the headphone goes to static and eventually turns off.  probably THE worst product offered on Amazon.

author: mery mcfadden
title: Be careful with the plug hardware.
content: The plug broke off inside my sons iPad and almost damaged his iPad..,not great!

author: Catlett
title: Very sturdy, great sound
content: These are very sturdy headphones. The piece that connects to your device, as well as the inch of wire leading from that piece are reinforced with a metal housing and flexible metal piece (on the wire).  The headphones fold flat to save space and avoid breaking them (which is what happened to my last ones--different brand--when the ear piece got caught on my tote bag).  These do not completely cancel all noise, which I like, because I want to be able to hear what's going on around me, especially when I'm out for my daily walk.  The sound quality is good, markedly better than the headphones these are replacing.  The only down side is that they're a little big for me.  They don't fall off, but they don't fit my head snugly.  I think I'll get used to this different feel.  Overall, I'm very happy with these headphones.

author: Charles Kirby
title: Great for Planes and Kids Alike!
content: I bought these for my kids first airplane trip.  I knew I wanted ones over the ear and had the capability of being "kid-friendly" as well as not limit the volume level as most kid earphones do.  They are perfect for both my wife and I and adjustable all the way down to my 3 year old.  I used them with an audio splitter and the sound does not lessen, but remains crystal clear with all devices.  I used them with an Ipad pro, Note 9, Mini Ipad, and Iphone X.  Everyone sounds just as clear as the next.

author: DeaDPooL X
title: Exceeded my expectations
content:
Very comfortable on the ear. Sound is amazing, great bass sound without over thumping.
Listening to music or talk radio and you can't hear anything around you, sound does not escape.
Cord is very long.
Metal plug and spring help me from damaging the cord.
Ear cups swivel, which was a nice surprise.
Price is very generous considering how great these headphones are.

author: Heather Ball
title: Compact and nice sound
content: Really like these! Very compact and sound really well. My daughter loves them...the bass from baby shark sounded great lol

author: SAMANTHA
title: I LOVE THESE
content: They are so pretty. The sound quality is great and they are super comfy!! I kinda wish they were more private so that everyone else couldn't hear my music though.

author: Anonymous HGST Buyer
title: Good Headphones for the Price
content: I purchased these to plug into speakers attached to my TV, so that I could watch TV at night and not disturb my family; for this purpose they are great. The build quality seems good for those who take care of their devices. The sound quality is good for my purpose and the price point. The headphones have bands on each size, adjustable for various head sizes. These do not include and in-line volume control, but that is not really expected at this price point. Overall good and working as expected.

author: Moonbeam-1992
title: Amazing Pair of Headphones!
content: These are the best pair of headphones I have ever owned. I decided to make a switch from using earbuds to this because they kept getting messed up. These headphones are of a very high quality. They cancel out annoying background noise and amplify your music. I also find that it has great volume control that allows for you to find the most comfortable volume for your individual needs. The sound quality is amazing. The best I have ever experienced music wise. Lastly, they are very sturdy. The wire is thick and strong and I love the coiled metal piece at the end. It helps add to the strength of the wire and protect it. I will definitely recommend this product to my friends and family :).

author: Stephen Salniker
title: Awkward To Wear
content: I wear glasses and found them difficult to use and they pinched my ears. If you are planning a hot date with Henry Mancini LPs and a cocktail, find a more expensive pair to use, or just take off your glasses.

author: shophopper
title: Good product for the cost
content: You can't go wrong with these headphones - got them for kids to use at school and as a spare set. They are great, comfortable, decent sound and worth the value pricing.

author: Vero M.
title: Great product for the price!
content: These are great headphones for the price. The sound quality and volume are great! These are not noise cancelling headphones, but they are not advertised as such and I didn't expect them to be. They do a good enough job at isolating the sound coming through the headphones with enough volume capacity to mute the external noise to a certain extent.  Nice looking and easy to fold and store. All in all a great purchase.

author: R. Cowen
title: Excellent sound!
content: These headphones are amazing. The sound quality exceeds any  that I have owned.  The bass response is rich and full, but doesn't overpower the other ranges. The sound is natural like being at the performance.  Hard to believe that they were only about $15.

author: Plain Jane
title: These are huge and they HURT
content:
I am an adult with a normal size head.  The smallest setting on these is too long.  Instead of the headphones sitting nicely on my ears, they pinch the top of my ear and hang below the bottom of my ear.  So there's no noise cancellation because they aren't right over my ear hole.  It would have been just as easy to make the smallest setting smaller to accommodate everyone, since you can always adjust it to be bigger.
Update: I have been trying to use these anyway to get my money's worth, and the pinch my ears so tight that it is painful.  Not just uncomfortable.  These HURT.

author: Defaultgen
title: Pretty bad audio, but good features and materials for the price
content:
These are cheap headphones with a reasonable build quality and more features than I'd expect for the price. I use these at work to toss around, watch Youtube, etc., not for anything like serious music listening, so my requirements are pretty limited.

The headband band is fully padded. The cushions have decent faux leather, not the papery stuff. They fold up easily but feel sturdy while worn. They are fairly large (Amazon Basics brand is small by comparison, the headphone band snapped in a few months of moderate use). They even look decent.

The sound quality is honestly pretty bad, they are very bassy, muddy, and unbalanced. I really can't imagine how people are saying the audio quality of these is good compared to anything else. If you're listening to music, I would try upping your budget to something decent. If you just need a serviceable pair of cheap, decently comfortable on-ear headphones for Youtube or voice chat or something, they're serviceable.

author: Sodie
title: works great
content: Sound and mic quality is good. I thought that there was something wrong with my computer but it was the previous headset. This headphone+mic works perfectly with great sound.

author: Ellen
title: Excellent value!
content: I wanted to be able to watch different shows on my Amazon Fire from the rest of the family and this works just perfectly.  It is not worth #200 but then it didn't cost $200!  I am able to crochet in a separate world, and that was just what I was looking for.  You control the volume on the device it is attached to!

author: Keith
title: Clear audio quality both ways
content: I bought these to use while gaming, and they are exactly what I need. I can hear all the sounds clearly as well as my friends, and they can hear me too, better than the cheap Tin Can sounding microphone that came with my other pair of headphones.

author: Travis Dommert
title: Nice product.  Excellent value.
content: Quality packaging and well-designed product.  My expectations were admittedly low given the price, but given the other positive reviews, I decided to give it a try and was not disappointed.  Comfortable, good sound, overall a good purchase.

author: RunningMom
title: Crisp sound and great value for money
content: I actually purchased these for my son (10 yrs old) but as you can see from my picture, they fit me as well. I got these mainly for him to use at school, in the car, and on airplanes. They are great for noise cancelling (as we all know the above places can be noisy). He hasn’t told me to turn down my music in my car! Ha! I also like how small they fold up, making it easy to pack. Win win!

author: KitKat
title: Superb Sound Quality (Updated Review)
content: 9/30/19-This is an updated review, they have completely stopped working in only 2 months. (Old Review)-Received these headphones the other day and plugged them in my phone to listen to music and all I can say is the sound quality on these are superb. I really enjoy a good quality headphone that blocks out sound and give good quality listening. This is my honest review and I would recommend these to anyone looking for a great headphone for your computer of android. If this helped you in anyway please click the help below. Thanks! 9/30/19 I would not recommend these due to the quality of the headphones not lasting anymore than 2 months.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Budget friendly headphones!
content: These headphones get the job done for a good price. The cups fit well and I can comfortably listen to music for long hours without my ears hurting. It definitely blocks sound from the world while I wear them, but my music does leak if my volume is too high. It has a mic (no volume control) so I can take calls without having my phone to my ear always. The length of the wire is quite long and may get caught on things, but I haven't seen this as a big issue. Would recommend to everyone!

author: Alisha Fair
title: Great quality and affordable
content: I just recently started doing transcription work and I needed a pair of headphones that worked well but I really couldn’t justify spending a ton of money on a pair. I spent some time reading reviews for different brands but kept coming back to these. The affordable price had me a bit skeptical as you typically get what you pay for. I have had them a few weeks now and use them daily. The sound quality is clear and they do very well with noise cancellation. I am very pleased with my purchase.

author: Melissa Mena
title: It’s worth it.
content: What I liked is how the sound. It’s great when listening to music or watching videos, the bass sounds great. It’s worth getting.

author: Truly
title: Nice lightweight headphones
content: We needed lightweight over-ear headphones and these fit the bill nicely. Sound quality is good, and the audio jack is sturdy. The weight makes them easy to transport for travel.

author: Ignat
title: Surprisingly high quality for such price
content:
I bought these headphones for my son. He is mainly using them to playing games and watching videos. The best thing he likes about these headphones, that nobody can hear the sound from the speakers, even if you come very close.
The previous headphones he had cost around $80, this model is much cheaper and I was really surprised by the good the quality for that price. As my son told, they are the same sound quality as the previous headphones he had. The best thing I like about the design of these headphones is that its cable has a metal protector which should help them to last longer. I think I made a good choice of buying these headphones. My son is very happy with his headphones, and I've saved a lot of money on this great deal.

author: Mavel Vidrio
title: Great buy for the money.
content: I saw this in passing and was going on a trip soon so I decided to take a chance on these. Pretty happy with the sound quality and they are quite comfortable.  If you’re looking for inexpensive headphones, these are it.  I also like the durable steel connector that ensures this doesn’t pop in and out like other headphone jacks.  Overall great buy for the money! I also love the blue!

author: KFG
title: Don't fit and hurt my ears
content: These headphones were too big for my head. I am a petite person (5'3) and these headphones did not go small enough to fit comfortably. I may have stuck it out if the ear cushions were bigger, but they are very small and because of the improper fit, they hurt my ears. I have pretty average size ears and think even if the headphone frame did go small enough to fit onto my head properly, they still would have hurt my ears. I do not recommend this product if you have a smaller head or larger ears.

author: Steve Lutwin
title: Perfect in every way for my needs.
content:
I have an IPod Classic with multiple playlists and thousands of songs on it. I use it all the time and am not willing to switch to a wireless system that requires cordless earpieces. I don't like earbuds or heavy headphones so I've been limited to over-the-ear headphones that have been less than successful for me in certain situations.
My headphones arrived yesterday and I used them immediately for an entire afternoon and they are perfect for what I need.
My wife asked me about them and after a trial , asked me to order a set for her which I did

author: Benjamin Trotter
title: Great travel headphones
content: These headphones are lightweight and fold up small. That makes them great for travel. I can enjoy my music and movies without bothering others and without worrying about wireless interference. The cord is of good quality, doesn't tangle easily and the sound is nice and clear.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Very good for the price
content: They are probably the best headphones you will get for the price. I really just needed something simple and inexpensive, was tired of putting in earbuds. Cant complain at all, quality is not chinese. Music is clear and has good bass.

author: DLDM
title: HIGH QUALITY HEADPHONES!! WORTH THE PRICE!
content: I bought these product 2 weeks ago, and is still working perfectly! I love the sound quality of these headphones. It also has excellent quality of noise cancelling especially when I am having my Online Classes, it helps me block out the outside noise. I also love the fit of these headphones for my big ears, it fits snugly and does not hurt my ears, it is very comfortable to wear, it doesn’t cause me any headaches unlike other headphones, and the best of all is the PRICE!! It is worth the price for this high quality headphones❤️I’m going to buy one for my sister! Love this headphone!

author: PREVIEWER
title: 10/10 would recommend
content: 10/10 headphones. The price is very low, and you get a polished, great pair of headphones that feel awesome. I also love the hard piece of material at the end of the wire that keeps it protected and sturdy, while giving it a pretty cool look. Just out of the box, I immediately began to love these. They can fold up for traveling, and I will definitely be using that feature. These headphones are definitely worth the buy, and it makes a good gift too.

author: Whitley
title: Great for the money
content: I am very satisfied with the headphones. They easily fold flat, the sound quality is great, and the coolest feature to me is the metal spring that is wrapped around the cord right before the jack. I've had so many headphones ruined in the past from the wiring in this spot getting wear and tear, but I feel confident that this design will help prevent that.

author: Kimberly
title: Great set of headphone for the price.
content: I'm honestly amazed at how nice and well-made these are, for what I paid for them. This is probably one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon so far. I love the strength and thickness of the cable and that the fact that is reinforced at the jack. Plus it gives great sound for the price. This is NOT an Amazon purchase that I've regretted. May be purchasing more for my grandchildren to use as well.

author: Gloryosia
title: Surprisingly comfortable
content: I originally wanted these to use at work, something cheap for employees to use to do computer training. I ended up not needing them and kept them for myself. I love these headphones. I use them with my phone and my Roku remote app. I like being able to watch TV without bothering others with my volume levels. With the volume on a reasonable level they drown out my husband talking in the background, which he does a lot. They fit comfortably and don't put pressure on my ears. Overall, I'd buy these again. Looking into a pair for my son now.

author: JD Kroll
title: Not good enough to keep
content: The headphones fold well, look good & block out noise well, but ultimately they were not good enough to keep. The description said "full, balanced sound," but to  me the sound was muddy, not very clear. For about the same price, but superior sound, I'd recommend https://www.amazon.com/Monoprice-Lightweight-Headphones-Controls-Microphone/dp/B014399CWK/. I did a direct comparison, with different kinds of music, then I returned these.

author: Sharon
title: Clear and consistent sound - highly recommend
content: I'm a little hard of hearing so I use this primarily on my computer so I can watch shows and have the volume up louder than I would normally play the TV.  I had another elaborate headphone and found that the voices did not come through clearly at all even at top LOUD volume.  These work great.  Just bought another set for my grandkids when they listen to CD's here.  The sound is great, its clear, and I don't have to have it all that loud to be able to hear well !

author: Laura Delgado
title: Comfy and sound quality
content: I liked how they fit well over my ears and are comfy to wear even for  long periods of time. They sounds great, and I liked that they can be folded to be put away. I love the long wire and that its only on one earphone so it doesn't get tangled as much as others.

author: Ramsey Campbell
title: As Good as They Get
content: I've had scores of headphones - some expensive, some cheap - but these are the best of the bunch, Lightweight, comfortable, with good sound. I literally can wear these all day.

author: myshopper
title: Lightweight and works great
content: Light and comfortable- sound okay for tv, not sure I would like it for music listening. Only thing that takes getting used to is how Bluetooth cuts out when there’s a lag in speech. Music is usually continuous so you don’t get that cutting out sound, like dead air or a disconnect. I guess you get used to it, but initially Im very aware it’s cutting out, but that’s how Bluetooth works. You don’t miss anything, it just sounds weird.  Just be aware if you get this for tv watching. Overall I think this is a good buy.

author: Robin ann 12-75
title: Cheap but SO COMFY. Very happy, good sound quality
content: Great! Needed a cheap pair of headphones to wear while I work. These fit the bill. Not too tight. Wide adjustable range. Padded and comfy. Wore them for 3 hours straight without removing and very comfy. Can’t believe they’re $11

author: LexiNYC
title: Good sound quality but microphone stinks
content:
I love Vogek's ear buds when on the go, and thought I'd get heavy duty ones for home use.

Unfortunately these were horrible and I returned them immediately.

While the sound quality for music was good, the microphone was awful. People told me I sounded as if I was under water.

In my business I need crystal clear communications, which these earphones did not provide.

For now I'm sticking with the ultra affordable Vogek ear buds, which work really well.

Higher price does not always equal better product.

author: rpkl
title: Well built--solid
content:
I originally purchased these for my mom. My boyfriend tried them out and like it so well, I bought another set for him. He liked the depth of sound (range especially the bass) and comfortable fit. I liked the price, although the first set I bought was $2.00 less than the second set. One more thing--volume control should be a zero. He said there is no control on the headphones.

Edited 05/24/2019: Third set purchased for me this time!

author: Fawn
title: Don't sleep on headphones.
content: These are great.  My 13 year old said they were comfortable and worked well.... until he slept on them. When I say slept on, I mean on top off, not simply wearing them. I would buy him another pair but then he would never learn the lesson, don't sleep on headphones.

author: Guitarkid
title: Great low priced headphones
content: I've had the expensive "backless" headphones for recording guitar, etc. they are sitting here one side broken off rendering over $60 gone....and I've had these around the same time. The difference is these still work, aren't close to being broken, and I've noticed since using them for recording, have close to the same quality in sound to the expensive pair I used for so long before they broke. As for noise cancellation I can't accurately review this as I don't use them in noisy areas.

author: Michael D O'Higgins
title: Outstanding quality for an amazingly modest price!
content:
My love of late night gaming with a rock and roll backdrop was severely jeopardized when my seven year old Granddaughter (8 pm bedtime) moved into the bedroom across the hall.  I've become accustomed  to a 5.1 system with a sub woofer, center unit, and 4 satellites with a total of 11 speakers between them. I tried using my phones earbuds but quickly gave it up as a bad job and went shopping for something better. I was planning on spending $70 to $100 for a "professional quality" headset but the low price and high rating of the Vogek's caught my attention. After reading all the glowing reviews I decided what the heck? It's only $12.95, no more than a decent set of earbuds. I can always use them with my laptop. When I tried them for the first time I was astounded! The headphones far exceeded my modest expectations.

PROS: High quality construction, very comfortable, Outstanding sound quality, microphone works well with VOIP applications, sound isolation is good considering they are on ear not full covering headphones.
CONS: (1) No operating instructions are provided. If it weren't for the product pictures  on Amazon I would never have figured out the mic. and playback controls (Pictures are available at vogek.com as well). (2) No volume control (not a big deal, just use the volume control on the device you're connected to.
CONCLUSION: You could spend a lot more on big name headphones with no improvement in performance

author: Ashley Yang
title: Great for the price point
content: I've had these headphones for almost a month now and they work great. They're very comfortable and easy to use, but I don't find that these are very sound-proof. They'll work fine if you're using them at home and want to block out the sounds of adult roommates, but if you're on a bus or train you're still going to be able to hear traffic and loud phone calls around you. For the price though, you can't really find anything better or more comfortable to wear.

author: James B.
title: So worth it!!!
content: I've probably owned around 10-12 headphones in my life and they are by far the most comfortable and clear sounding pair I've had...  Considering the price they are one of the best buys I've made on Amazon!

author: Humberto Mejia Maria Ortiz
title: Good sound great price
content: So i bought this headphones for my teenage son, he asked me for this headphones to play ps4 they sound so well that im thinking on buying for me. They sound great and for this price!!! Excellent.

author: Beth C.
title: not durable at all!
content: I Got these for my 13yo for Christmas and didn't even last 2 months. He used only on his laptop while sitting on his bed so not up and walking around. The wires came loose and lost sound in one side then one side snapped. Had good sound but why bother if you have to replace every 2 months. I would not recommend.

author: Brittny Dobson
title: Quality That Doesn't Break the Bank
content:
I bought theses headphones in August of 2019 for my special education students to use in the classroom for a variety of tasks.
The headphones have a very soft ear cushion and do not put too much pressure on the head when they are worn. The volume is very good and doesn't need to be turned all the way up to hear.
The mic is the best part for us. My students often record themselves reading their paper or a book. They do not need to hold the mic up to their face or yell for it to pick up their talking. They love that they can watch their videos and hear their voice without having a visible mic in the picture.
I love these mics for the quality and the price. I highly recommend these!

author: Vipz
title: Really good sound quality for the price
content:
I've only tried these headphones for a few days now but I'm sufficiently impressed with the sound quality and the linearity of the volume control. I feel that I'm not losing any frequencies at higher or lower volumes. The Bass is excellent too. The material looks sturdy but frankly it's too early for me to tell. The fit on my head is great. I use these headphones at work and my co-workers haven't heard any sound leaking from my headphones. That's definitely a good thing too.
All in all, I'm quite impressed with these headphones.

author: Victoria Clarkson
title: Very Comfortable. Good Quality
content: I have a new job in cubicle city and the endless chatter around me was unreal. I'm not used to that kind of workplace activity. I started listening to my music to drown out the noise so I could do my work, however earbuds just werent doing the trick. I didnt want to spend a lot of money so I purchased these inexpensive headphones. not only are they very comfortable, but the sound quality is excellent and it helps eliminate noise. The cord is nice and long and it feels as though it is well made. time will tell. right now i am very happy with them

author: dcyale
title: Good for the price, but forget the mic
content: Fit my big head OK, and the sounds good, just what I expected and needed.  I didnt buy them for the mic, but I tried a sound recording on my phone to see if I could use it as a Skype backup on the cell and it wasnt good.

author: Matt
title: High Quality Headphones for Low Price
content:
I have been against over-the-head headphones for a long time. The last pair I used and enjoyed was probably 15 years ago. I have preferred earbuds ever since. But after reading about the lack of sanitation that comes with earbuds used regularly, I decided to find some cheap headphones. And then I stumbled upon this product. Boy, am I happy I decided on this. When I get tech, I try to stay out of the sub-$20 region because there's usually a reason as to why it is so cheap.
These headphones, though, I don't know why. The cord, the softness of the padding, the incredible noise-cancellation, these could easily be $40-50 and it would be reasonable. The bass in songs and videos (such as ASMR videos) is great. The metal tip and covering on the jack connector, that seems like that could take a beating and still have no wiring issues. I had to do some classwork in a public space recently due to a power outage at home, and with my music going at a low volume, I heard absolutely nothing from the folks nearby and the cafe music overhead. Zilch. Nada. Not a single sign of life noticed outside of my laptop and personal space.
I will admit, I have not tried the microphone aspect of it, but even for having an extra like that, it's not in the way. It's there, it's noticeable when I'm unwinding the cord, but it's virtually unnoticed when I'm using the headphones like normal.
When I'm done using these for a while, they fold up with no issues whatsoever. They don't feel cheaply made, so I'm not worried about folding them up and having them break mid-process.
And best of all, nothing goes in the ear itself so there's no sanitary concerns like earbuds get. Seriously, these are an absolute steal for the quality and price. Vogek, you designed a winning product right here.

author: Jim Wyatt III
title: They work well and are comfortable for extended hours of use
content: My grandson is very happy with these. Much better than his previous headphones and less expensive. This was the third set I have ordered.

author: Isnar Chew
title: it works.
content:
The sound quality is quite nice. I like how it is collapsible for storage convince. All in all a very nice pair of head phones, and I am very glad that I bought them. I did not realize that it came with a microphone, and it turned out to be decent enough quality. 
All in all, you get what you payed for, the price was neither high nor low, as was the quality.

author: dennis doverspike
title: Headphones with Small Mic
content: Has a Mic and I specifically wanted one without the mic. So I guess have to read the information more closely. Although I specifically searched for headphones without mics. If I wanted a mic, would have bought a totally different unit.

author: Mary Kelly
title: Quality
content: I like the light weight of the headphones and the comfort the cushioned earpieces provide. You forget you're wearing them, they're that comfortable.  The volume control gives a wide range, the sound clarity is excellent. For the first time I can actually hear nuances in movie dialogue, making watching movies a whole new experience. Obviously I really like them.

author: Irene Hirota
title: Great Price and Quality
content: These headphones are fantastic.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that the sound quality is very good, you can still hear the phone, and they are super comfy.  I did not expect that these headphones would be so good because they are so reasonably priced.  I read a review that they aren't good for women or small adults.  I disagree.  I am a petite woman, and they fit really well, and I do not think I have a particularly large head.  I really like the way that they fold up so it makes them so much easier to transport.  If there was a case for them, it would be better, but overall great besides that.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great equipment!
content: Very happy with purchase, highly recommend.  This is our third pair !  Let us clarify, it will be the second pair for our son who is a young tween gamer and we have a new puppy that nibbled on the first pair, so he asked on his X-mas list for a replacement pair.  He loved his first pair so much.  The third pair was given as a birthday gift to a friend that loved his original pair and asked for a set of his own as a birthday gift.  Nothing is more complimentary then to have something as you do because they like it so much.  Highly recommend, A+++

author: Mzunderstood
title: Cheap price, great buy
content: I just needed a cheap pair of headphones that didn’t go in my ears and make me want to cry. These are comfortable, lightweight, and sort of stylish. I think the sound is great but I’m really not a knowledgeable audiophile. The only reason it doesn’t get 5-stars is bc they are too big on my head and it can’t be adjusted further.

author: Donnie H.
